verses.text: \w My|strong="G3450"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w masters|strong="G1320"\w*, \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* we shall \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* the \w greater|strong="G3173"\w* \w condemnation|strong="G2917"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* in many \w things|strong="G4183"\w* we \w offend|strong="G4417"\w* \w all|strong="G0537"\w*. \w If|strong="G1487"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w offend|strong="G4417"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w*, the \w same|strong="G3778"\w* \add is\add* a \w perfect|strong="G5046"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w*, \add and\add* \w able|strong="G1415"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* to \w bridle|strong="G5468"\w* the \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, we \w put|strong="G0906"\w* \w bits|strong="G5469"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w horsesâ€™|strong="G2462"\w* \w mouths|strong="G4750"\w*, \w that|strong="G4314"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* may \w obey|strong="G3982"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* we turn \w about|strong="G3329"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="G2400"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* the \w ships|strong="G4143"\w*, which \w though|strong="G5607"\w* \add they be\add* so \w great|strong="G5082"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add are\add* \w driven|strong="G1643"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w fierce|strong="G4642"\w* \w winds|strong="G0417"\w*, yet are they turned \w about|strong="G3329"\w* \w with|strong="G5259"\w* a very \w small|strong="G1646"\w* \w helm|strong="G4079"\w*, \w whithersoever|strong="G3699"\w* the \w governor|strong="G3730"\w* \w listeth|strong="G1014"\w*.

\w Even|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* the \w tongue|strong="G1100"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* a \w little|strong="G3398"\w* \w member|strong="G3196"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* boasteth great \w things|strong="G3166"\w*. \w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, how \w great|strong="G2245"\w* a \w matter|strong="G5208"\w* a \w little|strong="G3641"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* \w kindleth|strong="G0381"\w*!

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w tongue|strong="G1100"\w* \add is\add* a \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*, a \w world|strong="G2889"\w* of \w iniquity|strong="G0093"\w*: \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w is|strong="G2525"\w* the \w tongue|strong="G1100"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w members|strong="G3196"\w*, that it \w defileth|strong="G4695"\w* the \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* setteth on \w fire|strong="G5394"\w* the \w course|strong="G5164"\w* of \w nature|strong="G1078"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* it is set on \w fire|strong="G5394"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w hell|strong="G1067"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w kind|strong="G5449"\w* of \w beasts|strong="G2342"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w birds|strong="G4071"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* of \w serpents|strong="G2062"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of things in the \w sea|strong="G1724"\w*, is \w tamed|strong="G1150"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hath been \w tamed|strong="G1150"\w* of \w mankind|strong="G0442"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w tongue|strong="G1100"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w tame|strong="G1150"\w*; \add it is\add* an \w unruly|strong="G0183"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*, \w full|strong="G3324"\w* of \w deadly|strong="G2287"\w* \w poison|strong="G2447"\w*.

\w Therewith|strong="G0846"\w* bless \w we|strong="G2127"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w therewith|strong="G0846"\w* curse \w we|strong="G2672"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* are \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w similitude|strong="G3669"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

Out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* \w proceedeth|strong="G1831"\w* \w blessing|strong="G2129"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w cursing|strong="G2671"\w*. \w My|strong="G3450"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w ought|strong="G5534"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* to \w be|strong="G1096"\w*.

\w Doth|strong="G3385"\w* a \w fountain|strong="G4077"\w* send \w forth|strong="G1032"\w* \w at|strong="G1537"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w place|strong="G3692"\w* \w sweet|strong="G1099"\w* \add water\add* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w bitter|strong="G4089"\w*?

\w Can|strong="G1410"\w* the fig \w tree|strong="G4808"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w bear|strong="G4160"\w* olive \w berries|strong="G1636"\w*? \w either|strong="G2228"\w* a \w vine|strong="G0288"\w*, \w figs|strong="G4810"\w*? \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \add can\add* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w fountain|strong="G4077"\w* both \w yield|strong="G4160"\w* \w salt|strong="G0252"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fresh|strong="G1099"\w*.

\w Who|strong="G5101"\w* \add is\add* a wise \w man|strong="G4680"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* endued with \w knowledge|strong="G1990"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*? let him \w shew|strong="G1166"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* a \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w conversation|strong="G0391"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w meekness|strong="G4240"\w* of \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* ye \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w bitter|strong="G4089"\w* \w envying|strong="G2205"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w strife|strong="G2052"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*, \w glory|strong="G2620"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w lie|strong="G5574"\w* not \w against|strong="G2596"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*.

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* \w descendeth|strong="G2718"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* from \w above|strong="G0509"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \add is\add* \w earthly|strong="G1919"\w*, \w sensual|strong="G5591"\w*, \w devilish|strong="G1141"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w where|strong="G3699"\w* \w envying|strong="G2205"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w strife|strong="G2052"\w* \add is\add*, \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \add is\add* \w confusion|strong="G0181"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w evil|strong="G5337"\w* \w work|strong="G4229"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* that \w is|strong="G2076"\w* from \w above|strong="G0509"\w* is \w first|strong="G4412"\w* \w pure|strong="G0053"\w*, \w then|strong="G1899"\w* \w peaceable|strong="G1516"\w*, \w gentle|strong="G1933"\w*, \add and\add* easy to be \w intreated|strong="G2138"\w*, \w full|strong="G3324"\w* of \w mercy|strong="G1656"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w fruits|strong="G2590"\w*, without \w partiality|strong="G0087"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* without \w hypocrisy|strong="G0505"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w fruit|strong="G2590"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* is \w sown|strong="G4687"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* of \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*.
